pages.text: $(#008cff)The Darkstone Dungeon$() entrance can be found on the surface. It leads down to a maze-like spider infested dungeon. You must make your way down to $(#8800ff)The Spider Mother$() and exterminate her!

pages.title: Dark Amulet
pages.text: $(#8800ff)The Spider Mother$() drops $(#008cff)The Dark Amulet$() which is used to gain access to the next dungeon; $(#008cff)The Moontemple$().
